title: MXene/sPS nanocomposites: rheological, electrical conductivity, polymorphism, mechanical, thermal, and flammability properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25793-25801
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04190A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tongtong Zhang, Shuo Wang, Runkai Qiu, Xiaolong Yang, Fangming Zhu
The successful compatibility of MXene and sPS was achieved by modifying MXene with DCTES. D-MXene and sPS were mixed in solution and further hot-pressed and the influences of D-MXene on the properties of nanocomposites were studied.
